inn1.comm: beaten It was full in length, in the zone of temptation outside off and Ganguly had a nibble at it.
Good bounce on offer. This one kicked up from just short of length, and moved towards the hip. Ganguly tried to fend it off and the ball ran off the thigh pad
homing in on the off stump, a touch short of length and that allows Tendulkar to wait on the ball and open the bat-face to guide it to third man
Pure timing. It landed on a length just outside off and Ganguly eased towards the line and punched it on the up. He found the gap between point and cover and the ball fairly raced away
beaten Another lame poke outside off.
lands on the middle and leg line, on a good length and went on straight, turned away to the on side.
pitched just short of length,  a bit of extra bounce and Tendulkar guides to point
Kicks up from short of length, outside off and Tendulkar lets that one go through to Prior
another short one, in the zone outside off, left alone
Again short and Tendulkar was waiting this time and cut it past point. Good horizontal stroke.
another one that lands short of length, outside off, defended away to the off side
138.8 kph, delivery screaming past the off stump, left alone.
lands on a length, around the off stump, slanting away, pushed to cover
charges out, even as he backs to the leg side and attempts a pull shot. But the ball climbs more than he expected and he gets a top edge over the 'keeper's head. Safe.
bouncer that sails harmlessly down the leg side.
fuller, outside off and Ganguly thrashes it to cover but finds the man. One slip and a gully in place.
Wide down the leg side. Broad has been all over the shop here.
fuller and around the off stump, driven straight to mid off. Ganguly is timing them well but is yet to get his placement right.
pushed towards mid on for a quick single. The batsmen always find the gap and ability to run fast off the last ball.
around the off and middle line, again from short of length, Ganguly gets behind the line to dead-bat it away

Done in by the short ball. Another weak pull shot from Ganguly. It was on the middle stump line and Ganguly pulled it limply to square leg. Unlike some other batsmen, he never plays the pull shot completely,  sort of helps it around even as he tries to swivel and this time it looked even more half-hearted attempt than usual.
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
short of length, outside the off stump, Tendulkar tries to force it off the back foot and ends up mistiming it towards cover point.
beaten Anderson has got Tendulkar 5 times this summer and almost got him here. It was full in length, outside off and held its line, Tendulkar pushed at it inside the line.
on the off stump line, punched to cover
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side
The lemon cut or the Chinese cut. It nipped back in from short of length and Karthik pushed at it. The ball came in to get the inside-edge and ran past the 'keeper
Karthik is making a rather exaggerated back and across movement here. He was still moving when the ball jagged back in but he manages to keep it out

beaten Lovely delivery that opens up Karthik. No back and across movement this time and he is comprehensively beaten by a delivery that held its line after landing on a length  in the zone outside off stump.
homes in on the hip, beats the intended glance and runs off the thigh pad
on the off stump line, pushed to the off side. Another nagging over comes to an end.
beaten. Anderson, who has been bowling short, hurls this one fuller in length just outside off and makes it hold its line. Karthik is beaten by the length and then by the straightening.
full in length, on the middle and off, defended back down the track
And again. The last two deliveries have come in a touch. Will the next one go away? Or will it be short?
Neither. Another one that comes in. This time , from just outside off and Karthik leans forward to push it away to the off side
drifts down the leg side, Karthik shapes to glance but misses. The ball brushes the thigh pad and goes straight to Prior who goes up in a appeal. Umpire Aleem Dar shakes his head. Nice try Prior.
on a length, around the off stump, defended on the front foot
a tad short in length, outside the off stump and Tendulkar, it appeared, was going to cut it but lets it go past him

Similar delivery and Tendulkar goes for the forcing shot off the back foot but is cramped a touch. He had gone back and across, the back leg ending up outside off stump and he got too close to the delivery. The ball just rolled away to the off side
another delivery slightly short, outside off, slashed away to third man
lands on a length outside off, nips back in, Karthik gets behind the line to defend.
lands outside off, remains in that zone and Karthik is not interested.
full in length and it seems to have surprised Tendulkar, who is late in getting forward but manages to keep it out in the end.
beaten Lands on a length, outside off stump and holds its line. Tendulkar shuffles and pushes at it. The bat went inside the line and the ball moved past the  outside edge.
Again the fuller length trouble Tendulkar. He was expecting a short-of-length delivery and is late in moving forward, manages to push it back to the bowler.
bouncer just outside off stump and Tendulkar sways away at the last minute
Short and wide, slapped past point.
fuller in length, and jags back from outside off stump, Tendulkar lunges forward in defense but the ball beats him and thuds into the midriff.
guided to backward point and they think about a run initially but decided against it as Collingwood swoops in
on the off stump line, defended towards cover
fuller, just outside off stump, left alone
homing in on the off stump, punched to cover
lands outside off stump, nips back in with bounce and Tendulkar is cramped up as he shapes to force it off the back foot. The ball rolls away towards cover point

Climbs up from short of length, outside off and Tendulkar seems to be beaten by the extra bounce and he adjusts by opening the face of the bat. And the ball flies through the vacant second slip region.
pushed to cover
kicks up from short of length, outside off, Tendulkar hops up, gets on top of the bounce, takes the bottom-hand off the handle and defends
fuller, just outside off, Tendulkar leans forward to defend. He was not late in moving forward this time.
bangs it in short, outside off, Tendulkar plays the horizontal cut but not with any power and the ball the goes towards point
full-pitched outside off and Karthik stirs. He goes for a square drive but ends up mistiming it to point
Karthik falls. Short and wide, Karthik goes for a cut shot but only ends up edging it to Prior. Clearly that Chak De movie is doing no good to these guys.
welcomes him with a bouncer outside off, Dravid jumps up to defend
fuller, outside off, driven to mid-off
Another bouncer just outside off stump, swayed away
fuller, homing in on the off stump, Tendulkar stays back and punches it to cover
hits the deck short of length, outside off,comes in, Dravid moves towards the line to push it to cover point
another bouncer. Dravid lets this one fly past him.
in the channel outside off stump, Dravid covers the off stump and shoulders arms
on the middle, from short of length, pushed to the on side
almost got through. It landed on a length outside off stump, jagged back in and almost got through the defenses of Dravid. It collides with the inside-edge and on to the inner thigh

He gets his man this time. It landed outside off stump, kicks up and doesn't come in as much as Dravid expected. As a result Dravid pushed at it, inside the line and the ball took the outside edge en route to Prior. Choke day India?
on the hips, tucked away
in the channel outside off stump, left alone
short of length, outside off stump, Tendulkar shapes to play a forcing back-foot shot and again, ends up mistiming it to the off side.
lands on a length, just outside off, comes in a touch, turned to the on side
breaks free with a gorgeous off drive. Full in length, just outside off stump and Tendulkar drives on the up, through the line, between the bowler and the mid-off fielder
beaten. In the zone outside off and Tendulkar is beaten as he again pushes inside the line
on the off stump line, Yuvraj gets behind the line to turn it to the on side
short of length, on the off stump line, worked to square leg
A rare error. Wide down the legside.
homing in on the off stump line, from a length, carefully pushed away to the off side.
short of length, outside off stump, holds its line, Tendulkar pushes at it in the last minute and is beaten
screamer of a bouncer, going past the nose - the perfume ball. Tendulkar drops his wrists and sways away.
fuller, on the leg and middle line, Tendulkar shapes to glance it away, misses and the ball rams into the thigh pad
on the off and middle line, defended on the front foot
on a length, just outside off and Tendulkar punches it through the line, on the up, through extra cover
again short of length, outside off, pushed to point. There are 5 men in the off side ring
sharp bouncer and Tendulkar is in trouble.  It climbs chest-high, on the off and middle line, Tendulkar takes the eyes off the line before fending it away to the on side
fuller, on the off stump line, defended to the off side
another bouncer. Second of the over. Wide called. Tendulkar manages to sway away from the line.
Full in length, on the off stump line, defended back to the bowler.
Goes round the stumps and hurls across a length delivery on the off stump line, Yuvraj pushes at it with an open face of the bat and runs it down to third man
goes over the wicket for Tendulkar. Full in length, on the middle stump line, cutting back a touch, Tendulkar is beaten in defense and the ball runs off the thigh pad towards the slip region
full in length, just outside off, Tendulkar shuffles across, plays it with soft hands, drops the ball close on the off side, wants a run but Yuvraj sends him back
shuffles right across, tucks away a short-of-length delivery on the off and middle, to behind square leg

from round the stumps again. Full in length and Yuvraj is beaten by the length - he was expecting a shorter one and shaped to duck before he realised that it was fuller in length and adjusted to defend it
climbs up from short of length, just outside off and Yuvraj withdraws his bat away from the line
full-pitched on the middle line, worked to the on side
short of length, just outside off, guided to point
fuller in length, around the off and middle, driven to mid-off.
even fuller, on the middle and off line, Tendulkar doesn't thrust his left foot forward, waits for the delivery before whipping it through midwicket.
on a length, just outside off stump, holding its line, left alone
banged in short, on the off and middle line and Tendulkar sways away quickly.
from round the stumps again. On the off stump line, Yuvraj stays back to push it back to the bowler.
fuller, again on that off stump line, holds its line, Yuvraj leans forward at the last minute to push it away to the off side
beaten. Full in length, outside the off stump, and cuts in late, Yuvraj shapes to punch it on the up and is beaten by the inward movement.
in the zone outside off stump, left alone. Flintoff is really testing out Yuvraj here. He brings some in and makes the other leave. Quite a good contest.
hits the deck short of length, on the middle line, Yuvraj wants to work it to the on side, gets a leading edge towards cover
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side. Another tight over comes to an end.
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, defended to the off side
full and on the off stump line, driven inside-out to cover
breaks free with a lofted shot over midwicket. Flighted delivery but too full and on the leg and middle line, Tendulkar cleared the front foot and chipped it over midwicket
drifting on to the middle line, driven to mid-on
lands on the off stump line, on a length, turns away, pushed to cover
flighted delivery outside off, full in length and Tendulkar plays a square drive but ends up edging it past the backward point.
just outside off stump, Yuvraj's back foot goes nowhere and he just wafts it away from the body, to point
loud appeal for lbw. It landed on a length, just outside off and came in with the angle, Yuvraj's bat comes outside the line and edges it to the thigh pad.
similar delivery but this time Yuvraj gets behind the line and pushes it to the off side
nasty bouncer, just outside off stump and Yuvraj takes his eyes off the ball and ducks. Lucky for him that ball moves away from him.
short of length, on the middle stump line, nudged to the on side
fuller, on the off stump line, defended to the off side.
fullish, on the middle line, driven to mid-on
full and on the off stump line, Tendulkar drives uppishly - catch it was the call from Collingwood- but the ball threads the gap between extra cover and mid-off.
on the off stump line, full in length, Tendulkar lunges forward to defend and ends up edging it to the on side
drifting on to the pads, tucked away to fine leg
on the leg stump line, Yuvraj doesn't connect well with his intended glance shot. The ball rolls away to the on side and Yuvraj is angry with himself for missing that opportunity to score.
on the middle and leg, defended to the on side
meanwhile Monty bowls one on the pads, tucked away to square leg
on the off stump line, turns in, Yuvraj goes back to a fullish delivery and turns it to the on side. It was a ball to lean forward ...
comes out this time, two steps, and drives back to the bowler
slightly short, outside off stump and Yuvraj is beaten on the cut as the ball holds its line
turns in, on the stumps, tucked away to the on side
flighted, full in length, driven to long-off for a single
on the off and middle, pushed to cover
full in length, slower in pace, Yuvraj checks his drive and ends up playing a uppish drive to mid-off
full in length, on the off stump line, driven to cover. Tendulkar walks across to have a chat with Yuvraj.
drifting on to the pads, clipped past square leg for a single
full in length, just outside off stump, driven to long-off for a single
on the middle and leg, paddled away
slightly short of length, outside off, mistimes a cut shot to point
fuller, turns in from off stump line, Yuvraj leans forward to defend and the ball evades the bat and thuds into the pad
on the off and middle, defended on the front foot
fuller, outside off and Yuvraj goes for a sweep shot
offcutter, lands on the leg and middle line and cuts across Yuvraj, it was slower in pace as well, and it beats Yuvraj's intended defensive stroke and strikes the thigh pad
fullish, on the middle and leg, clipped through the on side for a sin
full in length, on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
offcutter on the leg stump line, clipped to long leg
slow off cutter, on the off stump line, Tendulkar shapes to play to the on side but the slowness beats him and he has to be contend just pushing it back down the track
full and driven down the track
beaten full in length, outside off stump, Yuvraj is beaten as he tries to run it through third man
on the leg stump line, worked behind square leg
on the middle stump line, Tendulkar waits for the slight turn to play out before pushing it through cover point
fuller, on the middle and leg, turning down leg, flicked to short fine leg
turns from outside off, slightly short in length and Yuvraj cuts it past backward point. 50 of the partnership is up.
full in length, on the off and middle, driven to mid-off
slowish off cutter, just outside off, Tendulkar wants to paddle it away but is beaten by the lack of pace and the ball strikes the front pad
fuller, on the off stump line, uppishly driven to mid-off
takes off the pace again, just outside off, pushed to left of Pietersen at cover
fuller, on the leg and middle, flicked to deep square leg and by the time Monty comes across from long leg, they run two
on the leg stump line, clipped away to Monty
beaten. Tossed-up, outside off, full and Yuvraj goes for a sweep shot but ...
turns in from outside off, driven to long-on
drifts in on the off and middle line, Tendulkar stays adjacent to the line, pushes it inside-out to sweeper cover
quicker but short as well, outside off, and Yuvraj rocks back to cut it past point.
comes down the track to a flighted loopy delivery and as it dips rapidly in front of him, he adjusts to push it back down the track
leans forward to push a fuller one to point region for a single
full, that slowish off cutter again, on the middle and off stump line, Yuvraj drives uppishly between Tendulkar and the umpire
full and on the middle and leg, Tendulkar turns it with soft hands past square leg , immediately calls two and gets them as well.
quicker, just outside off stump, Tendulkar steers it to third man to bring up his fifty.  Not a fluent innings this but he has fought on.
pushed through extra cover for a single
hello?! A wild heave but not much contact. He took a step or two down the track and tried to heave it over midwicket but edges it on to the pad.
full and on the middle, whipped through midwicket for a single
gentle offspinner, outside off, defended on the front foot.
drops it short, just outside off, Tendulkar backs away to make room and cuts it past the short third man fielder

Pietersen takes out Tendulkar with a near long hop! It was short in length, slipping down the leg and middle line, Tendulkar went for a pull shot but ended up top-edging it and Flintoff moved to his left at deep square leg to take a smart catch near the ropes.
another gentle stuff on the middle and leg, defended to the off side
again short - pushing his luck here, pulled to deep midwicket
another short delivery, turning in from just outside off, pulled down the ground, to long-on
full in length, just outside off stump, pushed towards point
fuller, straighter, on the off and middle, pushed to mid-off for a quick single
on the pads, clipped to Monty at fine leg
slowish, just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
fuller, on the middle, Dhoni leans forward to drive to long-on
offcutter, on the middle line, Yuvraj is cramped up a touch but manages to punch it to long-on
beaten Cuts him into half with a length delivery just outside off stump. Yuvraj's bat comes outside the line as the ball threads the bat and pad gap.
still from round the stumps - he has troubled Yuvraj with that line- on the middle and leg line, clipped behind square leg
on the off stump line, dropped close on the off side, Dhoni slipped even as he looked to run and Yuvraj quickly sent him back
he is pushing Dhoni on to the back foot here. short of length, just outside off stump, tucked away to square leg
full in length, outside the off stump, again the back foot goes nowhere as he lets that one go through to Prior
on the off stump line, pushed through cover for a single
on the middle and leg, full, clipped past square leg
on the off stump line, keeps a tad low, cut to backward point
slower one, on the leg stump line, Yuvraj shapes to pull, misses and it rolls off the pad
another slowish off cutter, keeps pretty low outside off, Dhoni is beaten by the lack of pace, has a waft at it and it goes off the inside-ede past Prior.
leans forward to push a length delivery to cover
full in length, just outside off stump, it cuts away from Yuvraj who has a tentative poke at it and is beaten
short of length, just outside off stump, defended to the off side
nasty bouncer. At the head of Yuvraj who manages to sway away at the last minute.
hits the deck short of length and climbs up, on the middle and off, Yuvraj stabs it away to the off side

edged away between Prior and the wide first slip. It was fuller in length, on the off stump line, cutting away a touch, Yuvraj stands rooted to the crease and pokes at it. The edge flies to the left of Prior who makes no attempt to go for it.
beaten. In the zone outside off stump, cutting away from Yuvraj who nearly has a fatal push at it.
full in length, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
on the off and middle line, full in length, Yuvraj stays back to dead-bat it away
on the off stump line, dabbed to the on side
fuller, low full toss, on the legs, flicked away to fine leg and by the time Monty rushes to his left, they get three
on a length, on the middle and off stump, no pace to work with and Dhoni nudges it to the on side
full and outside off, cut to deep point
on the off stump line, driven through the off side
turns in from outside off, goes back to punch it to long-off
slows up the pace, full in length, just outside off, patted to the off side
flighted delivery outside off, heaved to long-on
from the front of the hand, slids in straight on to the middle, pushed to cover
slightly short, on the leg and middle, lapped around the corner and Monty, at short fine leg, misfields
on the legs again, tickled to Monty at short fine leg
again that slowish offcutter, this time its Dhoni who is early onto his drive and the ball goes in the air to long-on
full in length, whipped to midwicket where Pietersen misfields. They have caught the Indian virus. Actually, the outfield here is not so smooth.
fullish, on the middle and leg, driven to long-on for a single
turns in from outside off, on a length, beats the intended defensive stroke and strikes the pad
full and straighter, outside off stump, pushed through cover point for a single
drifts in from round the stumps, on the leg and middle, strikes him on the pad, Going down leg.

He nags you with the mundane before surprising you with a work of art. Here is another Monty special. From round the stumps, it drifted in, landed on the middle, Dhoni leans forward, tries to guide it to third man region with an open-face of the bat but the ball evades the bat and crashes into the off stump. Monty is over the moon. He does his unique jig.
lands outside off, turns away, guided to backward point. A silly point is in place for Agarkar.
on the middle and leg, jabbed away
on target right away - full in length, on the middle stump line, Yuvraj again chooses to stay back and defends to the on side
fuller, on the off stump line, square driven to point
fullish, on the middle and leg, tucked past square leg for a single
full in length, outside off stump, square driven to sweeper cover
Agarkar rings the room service and is served a short and wide one, cut away fo the boundary.
Another one goes down. It landed on a length, just outside off stump and held its line, Agarkar pushes at and ends up nicking it behind.
fullish, almost a yorker length, stabbed away to the off side
slows up the pace, on a length, outside off, defended on the front foot
full, pretty full, outside off stump but Yuvraj shapes to cut and inside-edges it on to the ground and to Prior. Bad shot selection.
spinning in from outside off, nudged to the on side
beaten. Lands outside off, turns in a touch, Yuvraj anticipates more turn and ends up playing inside the line. Prior fails to gather cleanly.
full-pitched outside off stump, square driven past point
reaches his fifty with a smashing pull shot. It was short in length and sit up nicely for Yuvraj to push back after leaning forward and unfurl a massive pull shot over deep midwicket.
fuller, in the zone outside off stump and Yuvraj is beaten, trying to run it down to third man
overpitched outside off stump, creamed away through cover region. Classy stroke.
low full toss ,outside off stump, driven to left of sweeper cover.
half-volley outside off stump and Yuvraj knifes it through extra cover. The sweeper cover had no chance.
full and outside off, driven through cover point
turns in from the off stump, paddled away to fine leg
loopy delivery, on the off stump and Yuvraj suddenly decides to go for a reverse-sweep and almost top-edges it to short third man.
full in length, on the stumps, defended on the front foot
full in length, driven to long-on
on the hips, tucked past square leg
lands on a length, on the middle and leg, Powar goes back to wrist it to square leg
from round the stumps, drifting down leg stump, Yuvraj gets a tickle down leg and it falls well short of a diving Prior who makes a half-stop
pushes towards mid-off for a single
fullish, bit of late inswing, on the off stump line, driven to mid-off
chest-high bouncer, on the middle stump line, Powar couldn't get away from that but manages to fend it away to short fine leg region
drifts in from round the stumps, on the off stump line, Powar pushes it past point point and after bit of hesitation, they come back for the second run
lands on a length, on the off stump and turns away sharply, Powar is beaten on the defensive prod
full and on the middle and off line, pushed back to Monty
just outside off, full in length, steered to point region for a single
full, just outside off stump, Yuvraj goes for a mighty heave across the line, gets a inside edge and the ball rolls dangerously past the leg stump
leans forward, gets beaten in the air by a loopy delivery and just pushes it back down the track
full in length, outside off stump, square driven through point for a single. Powar is rotating the strike pretty well here.
Done in by a yorker. It was speared on the leg stump line, Yuvraj went across and tried to flick it but missed it completely. Huge blow for India.
short of length, on the middle and leg line, nudged to the on side for a single
Done in by the shorter one. Broad gets his fourth wicket. It was banged in short, on the off stump line, Powar shaped for a pull shot but was beaten for pace and ended up ballooning it to square leg.
in the channel outside off stump and Zaheer is beaten, trying a dab to thirdman
leg cutter outside off stump, Zaheer chooses to let that go past him.
from round the stumps, homing in on the off, nudged to the off side
on the middle stump line, turned away  behind square leg
heavy ball, climbs from short of length, Zaheer Khan goes back and across, gets on top of the bounce, pats it gently towards cover point
beaten Full in length, just outside off stump, cuts away late and Chawla has a tentative poke at it
kicks up from short of length, chest-high, Chawla adjusts by taking the bottom-hand off the handle and pushes it down to third man
fuller, on the middle and leg, jabbed away to mid-on
from wide of the crease, short, shoulder-high, on the leg stump line and Chawla hops up to fend it away to fine leg.
fuller, pushed to extra cover for a single
banged in short, at the body, Zaheer decides to pull it but is beaten by the extra pace and it bobs away to the off side
lands short of length, outside off stump, Zaheer backs away touch to swat it over point
from wide of the crease, another short one, outside the off stump, Zaheer lets that one to fly through to Prior
short-of-length delivery, on the off stump line, dabbed close on the off side and they rush across for a quick single. Zaheer twisted his left ankle as he set off for the run. Ouch.
full and outside off, a slash and a miss from Zaheer.
low full toss, outside off stump, knifed to long-off
banged in short, at the body, Chawla hops up to get on top of it and turns it to square leg
Fullish, outside off stump, Zaheer backs outside leg stump and slices it over point. Unadulterated slogging.
attempted yorker ends up as a low full toss, just outside off stump, Zaheer pushes it to cover but it goes, off the inside edge, to square leg
almost a waist-high full toss, on the off stump line, pushed past cover
bouncer on the off stump line, Zaheer is beaten by the extra bounce
fuller, on the off stump line, just what Zaheer wanted and he heaves it to wide long-on region.
back to the short-of-length delivery, outside off stump, Zaheer tries to cut but the ball bounces over the flashing blade
on the off stump line, pushed to cover
on the middle and leg, short of length, tucked past square leg
short of length, on the middle and leg, pulled away past midwicket
bouncer, at the body, on the leg and middle line, Zaheer twists his body to short-arm jab it to long leg

Zaheer falls after a breezy innings. It was a slower one, full in length, outside off stump, Zaheer backed to the legside and attempted to heave it over the off side field but just managed to slice it over cover. Collingwood runs back from cover to take it.
short of length, on the middle and leg, glanced to backward square leg
bouncer, over the off stump line, RP Singh lets it go above him. Wide called. Anderson is not happy with that call.

Anderson brings an end to the Indian innings with a slower one. RP Singh is flummoxed and ends up scooping an attempted slog-drive towards square leg. Bopara runs in from deep midwicket, dives full length to take a stunning catch.

inn2.comm: full and on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket.
beaten. Slightly short of good length, outside the off stump and curved away, Cook went for a cut but didn't make any contact
fuller, straighter, Cook lunges forward to defend and inside-edges to square-leg
beaten again. Full in length, outside off, sucking Cook into a lame prod

The middle stump has gone for a walk. It landed on a length, around the off stump before jagging back in. Cook pushed forward to defend but his bat came outside the line as he was beaten by the nip-backer.
fuller, just outside off stump, driven to cover. Zaheer walks towards Bell and had a few words to say. Aleem Dar moved in to  chat with the bowler. Hmm..
In the zone outside off stump, left alone. Two slips in place.
on the middle, drifting towards middle and leg, worked through midwicket
full ball on middle stump, driven on the up to mid-on where RP Singh fumbles to allow the single
banged in short, at the body, pulled to square leg
Full and outside off stump, Bell, in ODI form of his life, eases forward to cream it through extra cover. Lovely stroke.
on a length, outside off stump, dabbed to third man
terrific delivery. It landed on a length, on the middle and leg line and moved right across Bell, who poked at it.
fuller and outside off, Bell is quick to get on to the front foot to drive through cover region. Powar runs back but makes a mess while trying to pick the ball up and gives away an extra run
kicks up from a length, on the middle, tucked to right of square leg
full in length, slanting away from Bell who covers his off stump before shouldering arms
short-pitched delivery, at the left shoulder, pulled away towards Agarkar at long leg and they run hard to get two.
lands outside off stump, on a length, and moves away further, left alone

A fatal upper-cut. It was banged in short, just outside the off stump, Prior shaped to cut it over point but was hurried on by the extra pace and the ball flew to Powar at third man. I thought I heard a sigh of relief. It must have come from  Robin Singh, the fielding coach.
short of length, on the off stump line, pushed to cover.

Dropped by Tendulkar at first slip. It climbed up from short of length, outside off stump and Bell went for a cut. The ball took the edge and flew over Tendulkar who was bit late in jumping up - the ball flew at some pace too - and he got fingers to it.  A pretty tough chance, though.
on the middle and leg, turned to fine leg
length delivery outside off stump, left alone
Pretty wide outside the off stump, Pietersen thinks about chasing it but lets it fly past him
on a length, around the off and middle, Pietersen lets it come to him before wristing it past square leg
This one flies past a diving Ganguly at second slip. Slightly short of length, outside the off stump and Bell again goes for a cut shot. The edge takes the ball well to the right Ganguly
Crispy drive. Full in length, around the off stump line, driven to right of mid-off where Powar dives to make a half-stop
Fullish, just outside the off stump, Pietersen is quick to latch on to that - creams it through cover region.
lands on a length, on the leg and middle, and goes on with the angle, Pietersen tries to work it to square leg, misses and is struck on the thigh pad
And again. More pace and bounce and that disconcerts Pietersen.
beaten. Bell is living  dangerously here. Full in length, outside off stump and he goes for a cut and is beaten. May be he is a touch over confident as he is in great form.
Short of length, outside off stump and Bell forces it past point and Powar runs across from wide third man and makes a mess of it. Another poor effort from an Indian this summer.
Bell continues to be ambitious. Perhaps too ambitious. He walks down the track and tries to pull a short delivery from outside off and is beaten

Would you believe it? Bell has shouldered arms and the off stump has been pegged back. It landed on a length, just outside off stump and moved in. Bell, who has been playing shot-a-ball so far, suddenly went strokeless. He shaped to leave it and to his horror, the ball went on to crash into the off stump.
nagging line and length, around the off stump, Collingwood shuffles across, gets behind the line to defend. That was quite pacy from Agarkar - 88.5 mph
full and on the middle line, defended to the on side

Huge huge appeal for lbw. It was full in length, on the middle and leg line, moved in towards middle, Pietersen shaped for a drive, the bat came outside the line and it struck him on the pad in front of the middle, below the knee-roll. Aleem Dar negates it.  Dar felt  there was an inside-edge. The snickometer also shows some movement. So there must have been some wood on the ball
screaming bouncer and Collingwood jumps up to fend it away towards square leg
full in length, slanting away, pushed to the off side
full in length, on the middle and leg, wristed past square leg
full in length, on the off stump line, defended to the off side
full in length, slanting away, left alone
And again.
on a length, on the stumps, defended back down the track
fullish, on the legs, flicked past square leg.
lands on a length, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
fuller and outside off, left alone.
slightly short in length, angling away from Collingwood who tries to cut but ends up mistiming it to cover
lands on a length, around the off stump, goes with the angle, Collingwood jabs at it and gets a thickish outside edge to backward point
full in length, just outside off stump, Pietersen initially shapes to play but shoulders arms at the last minute
fuller, just outside off, holds its line, Pietersen goes for a drive, the bat-face shuts and the ball rolls over towards square leg
homing in on the off stump, Collingwood moves towards the line and pushes it to cover
full in length, outside the off stump and Collingwood eases on to the front foot and simply punches it on the up. The ball kept gathering pace as it went past mid-off.
fuller, outside off, driven to mid-off
bangs in a bouncer, just outside off stump, Collingwood sways away
on a length, just outside off stump, pushed to cover
slipping on to the pads, Collingwood attempts a glance, misses but it runs off the pad to fine leg.
beaten. peach of a delivery. It landed slightly short of length, on the middle and moved across Pietersen and past the outside edge.
short of length, on the middle and leg, worked to right of square leg where Chawla picks up and has a shy at the striker's end but misses the stumps. Collingwood would have made it even if it had hit
from round the stumps this time. It lands on a length,  just outside the off stump, Pietersen pushes at it inside the line and gets an outside edge, along the ground, to the right of second slip.
fullish, on the middle and off, driven to mid-on
back to over the wicket. On the stumps, full and straight, defended to the on side
starts off with a fullish one outside off stump, Collingwood square drives, partly-edged, partly steered, to point
drags back the length, on a good length this time, around the off stump, worked to the on side
classy off drive. Full in length, around the off stump, Collingwood moves towards the line to drive on the up and past a diving Dravid at mid-off
on the off and middle line, defended back down the track
on the middle and leg, wristed through square leg where Chawla misfields
full in length, outside the off stump, left alone.
again in that zone outside off stump, left alone
short of length, outside off stump and Collingwood goes back and across and punches it on the up through cover point.
full in length, outside off stump, left alone
a touch closer to the off stump, pushed to cover
lands on a length, outside off stump, steered to left of Powar at third man region
full and outside off stump, slight turn away, left alone
on the off stump line, Collingwood plays for the turn, its not there and the ball runs off the inside-edge to the on side
tossed-up, outside off stump, Pietersen leans forward, gets his bat well in front of his pad and pushes to cover point
outside off stump, driven to the off side
full, too full, on the leg and middle, Collingwood takes care not to push his left foot too much across  and whips through midwicket
lands outside off stump, turns away, cut to backward point.
on a length, just outside off stump, pushed to point
short and outside off stump, Pietersen tries to force it off the back foot and mistimes it to extra cover
again a touch short of length, outside the off stump, punched through cover point. Karthik makes a sliding stop near the ropes

Done in by the short-pitched delivery. Pietersen falls. Agarkar dug it short and outside off, Pietersen tried to pull from there but could only balloon it to square leg. Agarkar gets his third wicket. Indians think that Pietersen is susceptible to the short-pitched one and it has paid off here.
drifts on to the pad and Collingwood flicks it to deep square leg boundary. Very nicely clipped away.
another outside edge. flies through the vacant gully region. It kicked up from short of length, outside off stump and Collingwood stabbed at it.
flighted delivery on the off stump line, pushed to short cover
slightly short of length, just outside off stump, turns away and Flintoff is beaten, attempting a cut shot
on the leg stump line, jabbed away to the on side
drifts in, lands on a length on the leg and middle, Flintoff shapes to play to the on side but the ball spins across, gets a leading edge and goes to cover point
turning away from Collingwood who dabs it to short third man
short of length, outside the off stump and Flintoff knives it on the up, past backward point and Powar is slow to get across and fails to prevent a boundary
leans forward to push a length delivery to cover
banged in short, outside off stump, left alone

Agarkar takes out Flintoff. Big wicket. Full in length, just outside the off stump, Flintoff goes hard at it and ends up scooping it to Yuvraj at point. Agarkar is having  quite a evening. This is his fourth wicket.
greets him with a bouncer outside the off stump, left alone
on the off stump line, Shah pushes it to cover
well outside the off stump, Shah is not interested in flirting and Dhoni comes into play
short, on the leg and middle line, pulled away but straight to deep backward square leg
on the middle stump line, nudged to the on side
dances down the track, reaches the pitch of a flighted delivery and lofts it over mid-on.
lands on a length, on the off stump line and turns away, Shah is neither back nor forward, has a waft and is beaten
on the middle and leg, dabbed away
quicker one, slides in on the middle, nudged to square leg
slightly short of length, outside the off stump, played to cover
just outside the off stump, Shah moves back and across to dab it to Zaheer Khan at third man
again short of length, outside the off stump, guided to point
short of length, outside off stump, pushed to mid off
again a touch short in length, outside the off stump, Collingwood stands up tall to punch it on the up, through the line, through extra cover. Fab stroke.
bouncer outside the off stump, left alone
on the off stump line, turning away, steered to point
fuller, on the middle, Shah gets his bat in front of his pad and pushes it away past silly-point
full and outside off, driven to the off side
turns away, after landing on the middle and leg, dabbed past short-leg
lands on the middle and off, turns away from off stump, worked to the on side
full and on the middle and leg, Shah leans forward, takes care to get his bat in front of his pad and defends
starts off with a full-length delivery on the middle and off, worked to midwicket
short and wide, cut to Ganguly at deep cover point
full and slanting away from Shah, who lets that one go through to Dhoni
short of length, on the off stump line, chopped to point
full in length, pushed towards mid-off where Agarkar is standing slightly deep and can't prevent the single
short of length, outside the off stump, Collingwood goes back and across to defend
on the off and middle, defended on the front foot

Loopy flighted delivery, lands outside off stump, drifts away a touch, sucking Shah into a forward prod. The ball turns in, takes the inside-edge and bobs off the pad to short-leg. Powar has struck with his second delivery and England have lost their sixth wicket.
flatter, on the off stump line, defended to the off side
tossed-up, outside off, square-driven for a single
slows up the pace, loops up in front of middle stump and turns in, Collingwood is beaten, pushing forward and the ball strikes his front pad
leans forward to defend a full-length delivery, turning in from outside off stump
lands on a length, moves away, left alone
Short of length, outside the off stump, run down to third man
kicks up from short of length, outside off stump, Collingwood moves across, gets on top of the bounce and dabs it down to third man
again short of length, again that bit of extra bounce, slanting away from Bopara who sways away
full and angling away from Bopara who lets that one to go through to Dhoni
yorker, on the leg stump line, jabbed away to the on side. Bopara thinks about a single but sees RP Singh rush across to field and retreats
beaten by one that went straight on. It drifted away in the air, landed outside off stump and went on straight, past the outside edge as Collingwood pushed forward to defend
on the stumps, pushed to the on side for a single
lands on the middle, another straighter one, nudged to the on side

India have effected a run-out. Even Robin Singh must be pleasantly surprised. That's a huge wicket too. Collingwood is gone. It was tossed-up, outside off stump and Bopara pushed to point. Bopara didn't want the run, Collingwood wanted it and he pressed on. But Bopara's hesitation slowed him down a touch , RP Singh swooped on the ball and fired in a throw to Dhoni who whipped the bails off, with Collingwood out of his crease. It was refered upstairs and verdict was out.
on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
full and on the middle and off, pushed to the off side
on the middle stump line, on a length, worked to the on side
nice nagging line and length - full and just outside off stump, angling away and Bopara lets that one go past him
Full-pitched on the off stump line and Bopara creams it between the bowler and a diving Robin Uthappa at mid-off. Uthappa is substituting here.
goes round the stumps, loses control at the release and the ball is well outside the off stump. Almost a wide.
on the middle and leg, turned to midwicket
on the off stump line, turning in, nudged to short-leg
on the middle stump line, pushed to the on side

lovely delivery. Well-flighted, drifted away in the air, lands outside the off stump and turns in sharply, Bopara is sucked into a forward prod and is beaten by the spin. The ball goes between the bat and pad gap to Dhoni

beaten again. This time by the straighter one. Lovely exhibition of offspin bowling here from Powar. This one lands outside the off stump, Bopara shapes to off drive and is beaten as the ball goes straight on.
short of length, slashed to third man
good length outside off stump, he stands and pushes straight to point
stands his ground and wafts at one off the back foot, missing completely
and again, he's beaten driving with zero footwork at a fuller delivery, good line and length from the bowler
thats not what India need, he tries something different and bowls a short delivery well down leg side and thats a wide, Broad missing on the attempted pull
good stuff, slower delivery, full outside off stump and Broad flirts with it, leaden-footed, only to connect with air again
back of a length, Broad shuffles across to off and pokes it into the gap at gully for one to retain strike
lands on the off stump line and turns away, left alone
And again
floats it full on the middle, paddled away to fine leg
lands full and on the leg and middle stump line, Bopara shapes to sweep, misses and the ball just misses the leg stump
nicely tossed-up, on the middle stump line, Bopara thrusts his left foot across and wrists the ball past square leg
full and outside off stump, Bopara goes for a paddle sweep and gets it down to fine leg
flighted outside off stump, full, driven to cover
full and on the off stump, not much turn, defended to the on side
outside off stump, full in length, driven to point
flatter, full, outside off stump, Bopara is struck on the front pad  outside the line of the off stump
slower through the air, full and outside off, square-driven past point
on the off and middle stump line, full, driven towards mid-on
lands on the off stump line and spins away, Broad lets that one go
fuller, on the middle and off stump line, defended to silly-point
slower, turns in from outside leg stump, Broad goes back to work it past square leg
leans forward to defend a length delivery on the middle
flighted, on the middle stump line, pushed to silly-point
full and outside off stump, driven to cover
slightly short in length, well outside off stump, cut to left of Powar at deep point
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
lovely leg break. It drifted in, landed on the off and middle and turned sharply past the outside edge
lands on the middle and off and hurries on straight, jabbed away
slower, lands on the middle and off, sucking Bopara forward before turning past the outside edge.
shorter, quicker, on the middle and leg, punched to left of mid-on
comes down the track, drives to right of mid-on for a single
tossed-up, outside leg stump, Broad waits for it to turn in and defends
leans forward to defend a delivery on the leg stump. He is playing pretty well here,  taking care to play with the turn.
short of length, outside off stump, Broad goes to the back foot to force it away through the off side ring
on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket. Drinks break.
lands on the leg and middle, spins down leg, brushing the pad en route to Dhoni who appeals for a catch.
will get a single with a punched-drive to right of mid-off
leans forward, opens the bat-face and steers to cover point
from round the stumps, turns in from outside off, Broad stays back to whip it towards Powar at deep square leg and they rush across to get two
fuller, outside off stump and Broad is struck on the pad, outside the off stump
outside the off stump, left alone
goes back to defend to the on side.
goes back to turn a delivery behind square leg
well outside the leg stump. Wide called.
lands outside leg, spins in, Broad leans forward to defend
lands on the off and middle line, spins away and Broad leaves  that all alone
on the middle and leg, stabbed away
quicker, on the middle and leg, goes straight on, beats the intended forward defensive stroke, strikes the pad and bobs away to Karthik at short-leg.

lands on a length, on the off and middle line, pushed to right of point where Yuvraj swoops in and hurls in a throw at the striker's end. Broad makes it to the crease with a dive even as the throw misses the sticks and goes to long leg. They run for the overthrow
on the off stump line, defended to the off side
attempted yorker, on the middle and off, driven to cover
drifting on to the pads, Bopara shuffles across and glances it fine. Very fine.
full in length, outside the off stump and Bopara goes for a on-the-up drive to sweeper cover.
full in length, homing in on the off stump, Broad stays back to push it away to the off side.
flighted delivery outside off stump, driven to right of mid-on.
pushes that one through quicker and flatter but the line is well outside off stump and Broad lets that one go to Dhoni
lands on the off stump line, spins away, left alone
on the middle and off, Broad presses forward in defense and gets a inside-edge to square leg
on the off stump line, turning in, driven back to the bowler
fuller, outside the off stump, Bopara goes for a off drive but this one is the straighter one and he is beaten

slightly short in length, outside the off stump and Broad stands tall to knife it through extra cover. RP Singh moves to his left from deep point and makes a diving stop. But by the time he recovers and hurls in a throw, they run four
on the middle stump line, pushed back to the bowler, Zaheer fields and throws at the striker's end
fab stroke. Short of length, outside the off stump and Broad stands up tall to punch it on the up, past mid-off. Runs are coming in a hurry now.
fuller, on the middle, Broad stays back to drive to mid-on
sharp bouncer, Broad manages to sway away from the line.
tossed-up, outside off stump, turned, with the turn, to short-leg
slow in pace, just outside off stump, pushed down the track
quicker, straighter one, on the middle and off stump line, Bopara picks it off the track and defends down the track
tossed-up, outside off stump, drives to right of mid-on to bring up the fifty of the partnership. This is turning out into quite a contest.
outside the off stump, turning further, left alone
flighted on the off stump line, swept to long leg
floated on the middle and leg stump line, Broad goes for a sweep shot and gets a top-edge but it falls well short of short fine leg
sharp turn for Yuvraj. From round the stumps, it drifts in on the to middle and off stump, turns past the bat and brushes the thigh pad and goes to slip
on the off and middle, swept to short fine leg
on the middle stump line, nudged to the on side
bit more air, on the off stump, swept to long leg
faster, on the middle and leg, worked to midwicket
slips down the leg side. wide called.
slower through the air, on the middle and leg, turned to square leg and there is a wild throw from Karthik and England get an extra run
leans forward to drive to cover
full, just outside leg stump, turned to midwicket for a single.
from round the stumps, slightly short in length, outside off stump, Braod shapes to cut but ends up mistiming it to the on side
stretches forward to defend
googly but it starts from outside off stump and turns further away
fullish, on the middle, turns in, Broad shapes to sweep, misses and is struck on the pad. They appeal for lbw but it is turned down. Hawk eye suggests it would have hit the leg stump.
floated outside off stump, slow through the air, Bopara waits for the ball to arrive and plays a gem of a late cut, past the short third man fielder.
on the off stump line, defended to the on side
leans forward to a full delivery and drives to sweeper cover
on the middle and leg, pushed to the on side
on the off stump line, pushed to cover.
from round the stumps, on the off stump line, pushed to mid-on
sharp turn in, stabbed away
fuller, just outside off stump, defended on the front foot
full on the middle and off, driven inside-out past cover
turns down the leg side. wide called. England need 32 from 50 balls.
low dipping full toss, driven to left of mid-on
googly that slips down the leg side, another wide and what's more its a costly one -it runs down to fine-leg boundary
from wide of the crease, full and Bopara is struck on the pad, outside the off stump, trying to play it to the on side
offspin from round the stumps, punched to cover
from round the stumps, drifts in with the arm, Broad goes right back, tickles it to short fine leg
Another important strike by this calm Broad. Short in length, another offspinner, Broad goes right back to punch it through extra cover.
sticks to off spin, shifts his line to middle, defended down the track
on the middle line, pushed to the off side
fuller, quicker, defended back to the bowler
flighted outside off stump, turned, with the spin, to square leg
tossed-up, outside off, Bopara leans forward to defend
on the leg and middle line, Bopara drives to long-on.
full, on the middle and leg, Broad was unsure, pokes at it tentatively and the ball runs off the outer edge and goes through gully region
leans forward to a flighted delivery outside off and drives towards Chawla at mid-on. There is an unnecessary throw at the non-striker's  end and the ball ricochets for a over throw.
leans forward to defend. England inch closer.
from round the stumps, on the middle, pushed back to Chawla
beaten Tossed-up, outside off stump and Broad pushes inside the line
spins in from outside off, stabbed away
lands on the middle and leg, turns down the leg side, Broad gets a tickle down down legside and it brushes Dhoni's pad to fine leg boundary
on the off stump line, steered to backward point. 200 up. only 13 runs to get.
googly on the middle, calmly put away to the on side.
Agarkar starts off with a wide one outside the off stump. The England supporters love it. They let out a huge scream of appreciation at that wide.
More cheers as this one slips down the leg side. England need 11 more.
on the middle and leg, Broad shuffled across, tried to whip it to on side and got an inside-edge to the pad
full-pitched, outside off stump and Broad times it well and through extra cover.
on a length, on the middle and off stump line, Bopara leans forward to carefully push it to the off side. He is not going to take any risks at this stage.
fuller, on the off stump line, holds its line, Bopara shapes to square drive and Rohit Sharma, the substitute fielder, at point dives full length to make the stop
sharp bouncer, right at Broad who goes for the pull shot but is beaten by the pace and the ball crashes into the helmet.
full in length, on the off stump and again Bopara pushes it cautiously down the track
kicks up from short of length, just outside off stump, punched to point
short of length, around the off stump, pushed to cover

fires in a yorker, stabbed away and the ball rolls behind the wicket. Bopara calls Broad over for a quick single. Dhoni rushes forward and throws. The ball comes out between the legs of Broad and went to the  left of Zaheer khan who gathered it somehow but couldn't hit the sticks.
full in length outside off stump, steered to point
bouncer on the off stump line, Bopara pulls limply and it just clears mid-on.
short of length, outside the off stump and Bopara tries to punch on the up and edges it to Ganguly at third man
beaten. Full in length, just outside the off stump and Broad goes for a rather expansive drive.
fuller, outside off stump, slashed away, with the help of the outside edge, to right of third man where Ganguly makes a diving stop. The scores are level.
It landed on a length, outside the off stump and cut back in, clipped the back leg en route to Dhoni who goes up in appeal.
this one is in the zone outside off stump and Broad is beaten, trying to cream it through cover

That's it. England have won. Full in length, on the middle and leg,d riven towards mid-on and they rush across.  England lead 3-1 in the series. It has been a wonderful partnership between Bopara and Broad. Cool, calm and skillful.
